text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
extension 1..*ExtensionExtension
extension:scoring 0..1ExtensionLike Measure.scoring, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"scoring"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Value of extension
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: MeasureScoring (extensible)
extension:compositeScoring 0..1ExtensionLike Measure.compositeScoring, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"compositeScoring"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Value of extension
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: CompositeMeasureScoring (extensible)
extension:type 0..1ExtensionLike Measure.type, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"type"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Value of extension
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: MeasureType (required)
extension:riskAdjustment 0..1ExtensionLike Measure.riskAdjustment, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"riskAdjustment"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
extension:rateAggregation 0..1ExtensionLike Measure.rateAggregation, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"rateAggregation"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
extension:improvementNotation 0..1ExtensionLike Measure.improvementNotation, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"improvementNotation"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Value of extension
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: MeasureImprovementNotation (extensible)
extension:subject 1..1ExtensionLike Measure.subject, but applies to group
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"subject"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: ResourceType (extensible)
url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/StructureDefinition/MeasureGroupAttributes"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: MeasureGroupAttributes
title: Attributes describing a group of measures
description: Attributes describing the group of measures

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html) for a list).

element.short: Concept - reference to a terminology or just  text
element.definition: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.
element.comment: Not all terminology uses fit this general pattern. In some cases, models should not use CodeableConcept and use Coding directly and provide their own structure for managing text, codings, translations and the relationship between elements and pre- and post-coordination.
